Hi April,

The lastest version of EVP maker allows you to capture EVP's dir=
ectly to your laptop through a microphone attached to the Mic input on your=
 laptop. I got mine from http://www.giveawayoftheday.com.  They give away a=
 different software everyday.  They have a section for freeware that you ca=
n pickup any time.


Regards,
Jon in Texas
 




__________________________=
______
From: April Abercrombie <april@...>
To: EVP=
-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, April 8, 2009 8:35:32 AM
Subject: Re:=
 [EVP-ITC] Some more from last month.





Wow! Those are pretty clear! And=
 I have to 
say that I approve of the color. Purple is my favorite LOL!!!
 =

You know, I used to have on my computer 
little program that I downloaded =
called "EVP Maker". I wonder if that is the 
same EVP maker you mentioned o=
n this site. Unfortunately I lost it when I had to 
reformat my machine, an=
d could not find the link to the original download. I 
believe I found the =
original link from the "Shadowlands" website, if I remember 
correctly.
 
B=
esides that, this was YEARS ago, and I 
really did not understand how to us=
e it, or even what it was for.
 
----- Original Message ----- 
From: Frank =
Sumption 
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 
Sent: Tuesday, April 07, 2009 9:12 =
 PM
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Some more from  last month.

Yeah, see http://pu=
rplealieng irl.tripod. com/ 


On Tue, Apr 7, 2009 at 9:01 PM, April Abercr=
ombie <april@abercrombiegh ostresearch. com> wrote:

Realy?? Sweet!
 
-----=
 Original Message ----- 
From: Frank Sumption 
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com=
 
Sent: Tuesday, April 07, 2009 8:55  PM
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Some more f=
rom  last month.

Well, one anyway. ;-]


On Tue, Apr 7, 2009 at 8:42 PM, A=
pril Abercrombie <april@abercrombiegh ostresearch. com> wrote:

Do you?
 
-=

From: Frank  Sumption

Sent: Tuesday, April 07, 2009  8:28 PM
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Some m=
ore  from last month.

 that  house"


On Tue, Apr 7, 2009 at 8:20 PM, Frank Sumption <purplealien=
girl@ gmail.com> wrote:

 That's probably cuz I send most of these as e-mai=
l  attachments, and they don't go to group, yahoo stips off any  attachment=
s.
  F-S

 
On Tue, Apr 7, 2009 at 4:02 PM, threadsintyme@ juno.com <Thread=
sintyme@ juno.com> wrote:

Kristin,
I have the same problem also. When I cl=
ick on the link a window  pops up saying thast the URL is not correct...or =
has been  moved.
Al 


---------- Original Message ----------
From:  "Krist=
in Morris" <ckmorris95@sbcgloba l.net>
To: <EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com>

Subj=
ect: RE: [EVP-ITC] Some more from last month.
Date:  Tue, 7 Apr 2009 16:14:=
18 -0500


Frank.   My computer just won=E2=80=99t open these clips.  Very =
frustrating  for me.  I know it=E2=80=99s a pain in the arse to load them i=
n the  files section instead of just adding as an attachment but maybe  tha=
t might help?  Then again if it is just me with the  problem then no worrie=
s.  I love computers and hate them at  the same time!!  
k

_______________=
_________________
 
From:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogrou=
ps .com] On Behalf Of Frank  Sumption
Sent: Tuesday, April 07, 2009 9:45 AM=
 

To: grassharp@yahoogrou ps.com; evp-itc@yahoogroups .com

Subject: [EVP-=
ITC] Some more from last month. 
 I rarely know if anyone hears this  stuff=
, as few comment. The one about sausage is kinda  iffy."Princess, I never L=
iked that box..." is the same on as  "Princess I love that box...", I just =
hear it different this  morning. That's the only one I hear different from =
last night. I  included the forward, and reverse components. 
 These are fr=
om the test I did to see  if I could use a pre-recorded RAW audio tape in a=
reas wherer  there's no radio stations, sincve many insist on going to "hau=
nted  locations" that have few, if any radio stations to use for the raw  a=
udio. #48 has an aux input so other raw audio can be  used.
 Frank-S

_____=
_______ _________ _________ _________ _________ _________ ___ 
Research onl=
ine bachelor degrees from leading  universities today.
